Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the sale or transfer of certain real property by the state or public authorities
Summary: Relates to the sale or transfer of certain real property by the state or public authorities; requires mandatory review by the attorney general and comptroller of the sale of certain real property; requires notice to members of the legislature and county executives in districts and counties in which land subject to transfer is located of the proposed transfer of state property between state departments, divisions, bureaus, agencies, state agencies, or to a public authority or public benefit corporation.
LawCode: Amd ยง2897, Pub Auth L; add ยง33-a, amd ยง3, Pub Lds L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the public lands law, in relation to the sale or transfer of certain real property by the state or public authorities
